nodes.text: Uffel's Prisoners was a roleplaying-game adventure in year four of the Living Force campaign. It was the second adventure in the Inside-out trilogy and was written by Rob Edwards.

When the Cularin Militia receives reports that the Thaereian military have sent troops to Uffel, the heroes are sent to investigate. However, the Thaereians soon discover something that they can use as a weapon against all of their enemies in the Cularin system, and the heroes must prevent them from using it.
